akn:section.akn:heading: Enlisted members: officers not to use as servants

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 9239. Enlisted members: officers not to use as servants No officer of the Air Force or the Space Force may use an enlisted member of the Air Force or the Space Force as a servant. (Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 533, § 8639; renumbered § 9239, Pub. L. 115–232, div. A, title VIII, § 806(b)(8), Aug. 13, 2018, 132 Stat. 1833; amended Pub. L. 116–283, div. A, title IX, § 923(c)(8), Jan. 1, 2021, 134 Stat. 3811.)
